amendment.description: To add additional history relating to the wilderness.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4087 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4087 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S12018-12019; text: CR S12018-12019) To add additional history relating to the wilderness.
